attributes.action:
extend the security against foreign control of British heritage, custom, and society by amending the protection enshrined in the Act of Settlement from domination by a member of the Church of Rome to be extended to include similar prevention of control by a member of any religious group other than the official Church of
 England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is not intended to prevent the free practice of religion other than that approved by the Church of England, but to ensure a safeguard against slow but progressive erosion of traditional British freedom and the risk of domination by any foreign or world group intent on the introduction of oppressive change.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
